ComicInfo.Title: Quadling Quandary
ComicInfo.Summary: The newly-independent Quadlings set out to destroy the Lion and the forest he ruled as an Evil King, to avenge the crimes Lion inflicted upon them during those dark days. Meanwhile, Dorothy and her childhood friends Trot and Betsy Bobbin, along with Scarecrow, Tin Man and Hungry Tiger, set out for Good Witch Glinda's castle to the north in search of clues to the whereabouts of the Fountain of Youth. Based on the Wonderful Wizard of Oz books.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev57 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-09 18:27:06. [Issue ID 41925]
